QuestData.Title: A Sticky Task
QuestData.Description: Finding supplies on the island has been difficult, to say the least.$b$bFortunately, we have found a good supply of silk in The Darkwood, just north of here. The bad part of this story is that the silk comes from the glands on Broodmother spiders. I need you to gather 4 of these for me.$b$bThat should be just enough to finish up this last set of shirts.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 4 Sticky Silk Glands from Darkwood Broodmother spiders in The Darkwood. The Darkwood forest is just west of here, across the bridge on the central island.
QuestData.CompletionText: Were you able to gather the sticky silk glands?
QuestData.RewardText: These glands will do nicely. We are grateful for your help, $n.
